job.title: HR Data Analyst
job.industry: Financial Services,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Founded in 2009 and headquartered in Farmington Hills, Michigan, Centria Healthcare is a leading provider of home-based catastrophic injury and rehabilitation care, private duty nursing, and supportive living services. Centria Healthcare Autism Services is the largest provider of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) for children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) across the state of Michigan, with services in other states. The HR Analyst is responsible for partnering with leaders and human resources partners to help drive employee engagement and retention through reporting and analytics. The HR Analyst will use industry best practices and innovations to support the engagement efforts across the organization.
